Package com.obed.retoCP2024.services.impl

Class OrderServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.obed.retoCP2024.services.impl.OrderServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderService
@Service @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED) public class OrderServiceImpl extends Object implements OrderService
Service implementation for managing orders.
